title: Why not give us our ten placements instead of one?
body: Whats the thought process behiund this, I'm just wondering, seeing as it should be better for placements, shouldnt there just be a new 10 placements?

replies.body: I believe the idea was that this fix is going to be painful enough for a lot of people, especially those who put in hours of effort while matchmaking was all messed up. Making those people play 10 new placements would be harsh, when the system knows roughly where they should have been without them (by pulling from solo/duo rank).
